channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- 1st Gen EPYC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- 1st Gen EPYC

item.title: CVE-2021-26398|2024-08-03T20:26:24.878Z -- amd -- 1st%20gen%20epyc
item.description: Insufficient input validation in SYS_KEY_DERIVE system call in a compromised user application or ABL may allow an attacker to corrupt ASP (AMD Secure Processor) OS memory which may lead to potential arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-26403|2024-08-03T20:26:25.454Z -- amd -- 1st%20gen%20epyc
item.description: Insufficient checks in SEV may lead to a malicious hypervisor disclosing the launch secret potentially resulting in compromise of VM confidentiality.
